word: H1760 - דָּחָה - dâchâh - daw-khaw' - Chase - துரத்து

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - தள்ளு, கவிழ், துரத்து, இடி, வாரிக்கொள்
to push, to thrust, to chase, to overflow, to totter, to sore, to drive away
or drive out, to be outcast, to be cast down
a) (Qal) to push, to push violently
b) (Niphal) to be thrust down, to be cast down
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to push down: - chase, drive away (on), overthrow, outcast, X sore, thrust, totter.
Cognate: H1760, H1762, H4072
